game.name: Ruins Of Fear
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 카메라 움직임 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 자막 옵션, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Lucian wakes up on an ordinary school day to find himself in a deserted world. Together with Elora, he must solve puzzles, evade creatures in dark corridors, and uncover the mysteries around him.
